title: Commission Directive 86/489/EEC of 24 September 1986 amending Directive 77/794/EEC laying down detailed rules for implementing certain provisions of Directive 76/308/EEC on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims resulting from operations forming part of the system of financing the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, and of agricultural levies and customs duties, and in respect of value added tax
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 24 September 1986
amending Directive 77/794/EEC laying down detailed rules for implementing certain provisions of Directive 76/308/EEC on mutual assistance for the recovery of claims resulting from operations forming part of the system of financing the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, and of agricultural levies and customs duties, and in respect of value added tax
(86/489/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The first sentence of Article 20(2) of Directive 77/794/EEC is replaced by the following:
'From 1 January 1987 no request for assistance may be made if the amount of the relevant claim of claims is less than 1 500 ECU.'
Member States shall take the measures necessary to comply with this Directive not later than 1 January 1987.
Each Member State shall inform the Commission of the measures which it takes for implementing this Directive. The Commission shall communicate such information to the other Member States.
This Directive addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 September 1986.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
